verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
(Omorembe, Omorembe
Omorembe ob
ease more). x2
Buna tata ere antomete
omorembee obe aso more. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
(Obwanchani, Obwanchani
Obwanchani bobe
ase more). x2
Buna tata ere antomete
Obwanchani obe aso more.x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
(Omogoko, omogoko
omogoko obe
ase more). x2
Buna tata ere antomete
Omogoko obe ase more .x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
(Obosera obosera,
obosera bobe
ase more). x2
buna tata ere antomete
obosera bobe ase more. x2
